pr_title: Adding Mnemonics to the Main Tabs and Advance Day

timeline.message: Adding Mnemonics to the GuiTabType enum

timeline.bodyText: This fixes a potential null pointer return
timeline.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Why would this not be R?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: Ran out of mnemonic letters, and because of that I prioritized based on use. Repair tab sees more use than this one, so that's why.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: ALT+H is the standard mnemonic for a help menu.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I know... but I prioritized based on use, and until our help menu is improved it is not a useful one... although I did just realize G is open for hanGar.
replies.author: Windchild292
